hero.title: FanID: Revolutionizing Live Event Experiences
hero.subtitle: FanID's innovative platform connects fans with their favorite artists and events, removing barriers for more authentic, intimate, and fun live experiences.

challenge.title: Pain Points of Traditional Ticketing Systems

scalping.title: Ticket Scalping Issues
scalping.description: Scalpers exploit ticketing systems, disappointing genuine fans, leaving many seats empty, and exposing organizers to potential legal issues.

counterfeiting.title: Counterfeit Tickets Widespread
counterfeiting.description: Distributors and black markets steal $11.2 billion to $18.75 billion in profits from event organizers, producers, artists, and artist agents.

inefficiency.title: Low Entry Efficiency
inefficiency.description: Traditional ticketing systems have low entry efficiency, requiring manual verification, easily causing queuing congestion and poor user experience.

solution.title: FanID Security Verification System
solution.subtitle: Say goodbye to insecure and complicated traditional ticketing, embrace AI-driven future experiences

security.title: Security & Precision
security.description: AI technology with error rates as low as 0.1%, providing unparalleled security protection

verification.title: Reliable Verification
verification.description: One-click verification, allowing users to complete verification and purchase within seconds

efficiency.title: High Efficiency
efficiency.description: Complete identity verification in seconds, with smooth ticket scanning and entry

engaging.title: Fun & Engaging
engaging.description: Personalized avatar and interactive functions, making every experience unique

clientEncryption.title: Client-side Encryption
clientEncryption.description: Sensitive data is encrypted and protected on the client side, ensuring complete privacy

noExtraCost.title: No Additional Burden
noExtraCost.description: Simple mobile scanning completes verification without additional equipment investment

serverSecurity.title: Server-side Facial Data Security
serverSecurity.description: Comprehensive security without storing any biometric identification data

verificationFlow.title: FanID Verification Process
verificationFlow.subtitle: Simple scanning → AI verification → Instant access

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.description: Easy integration with existing ticketing platforms and venue management systems

features.title: Scalable Solution
features.description: Handles events from intimate venues to massive stadiums with consistent performance

features.title: Revenue Growth
features.description: Increases venue revenue through improved customer experience and reduced operational costs

features.title: Future-Ready Technology
features.description: Built with cutting-edge biometric technology and zero-knowledge privacy protection
